janadhipathi garu maithi්rapala sirisena mathithuma me bawa pa්rakasha kale , kolambaa shangi්ralla hotalaye pawathi jathika manik ha swarnabharana adhikariye rajatha jayanthi sammana ulela amathamini. 2015 janawari 08 wanada podu apekshakaya lesa janadhipathiwaranayata idiripath wemin thama sidu kale deshapalanaye udugambala pihinimak bawa mehidi sihipath kala janadhipathithuma ada dawase ratata ahithakara siyalu balawegayan iwath karamin gena yana mema wadapiliwela da deshapalanaye udugam bala pihinimak bawa kiya sitiye ya.
mita wada amaraniya anusmarana smarakayak widyagnyayakuta ho lekhakayakuta awashya nowe.
